meanings.definition: A book in which one keeps a record of appointments, meetings, etc.
meanings.sent1: My datebooks help me remember important meetings and appointments.
meanings.sent2: She always carries her datebook to keep track of her schedule.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally left my datebook at home and now I'm lost without it!
meanings.sent4: Her datebook is like a treasure chest full of valuable time commitments.
meanings.sent5: The datebook is my lifeline, guiding me through each day with purpose.

meanings.definition: To record appointments, meetings, etc. in a book.
meanings.sent1: I datebook all my appointments to stay organized.
meanings.sent2: He datebooks diligently to ensure he doesn't forget any important events.
meanings.sent3: My friend always jokes that I datebook too much, but it keeps me on track!
meanings.sent4: She datebooks her life away, filling each page with plans and memories.
meanings.sent5: Datebooking has become a daily ritual, like writing a story of my life in ink.
